Title: Data Source Outage
Description:
Feed provider experiences downtime or latency.

**Likelihood:** Medium
**Impact:** High

**Mitigations:**
- Multi-source redundancy
- 30s gap detection alerts
- Auto-backfill from secondary
- 4-hour manual intervention runbook

**Trigger:** >2 minute feed gap or >5s latency

**Owner:** Data Engineering
**Review Date:** Weekly

Title: Model Performance Degradation
Description:
Accuracy drops below acceptable thresholds.

**Likelihood:** Medium
**Impact:** High

**Mitigations:**
- Daily evaluation runs
- Automatic regression detection
- Block deployment on failure
- Retrain pipeline on standby

**Trigger:** Any metric below threshold for 2 consecutive runs

**Owner:** ML Engineering
**Review Date:** Weekly

Title: Payment Gateway Failure
Description:
Primary payment processor unavailable.

**Likelihood:** Low
**Impact:** Critical

**Mitigations:**
- Backup payment processor configured
- Automatic failover
- Grace period for renewals
- Manual processing runbook

**Trigger:** Gateway returns errors for >5 minutes

**Owner:** Finance Ops
**Review Date:** Monthly

Title: Founder Identity Exposure
Description:
Founder name/identity leaked publicly.

**Likelihood:** Low
**Impact:** Critical

**Mitigations:**
- Host-only policy enforced
- Brand monitoring active
- Takedown procedures ready
- Crisis comms prepared

**Trigger:** Monitoring alert or report

**Owner:** Security
**Review Date:** Weekly

Title: Legal/Regulatory Challenge
Description:
Claims challenged by regulators or litigants.

**Likelihood:** Low
**Impact:** Critical

**Mitigations:**
- Evidence locker for all claims
- Counsel review before publish
- Claims checker automation
- Insurance coverage

**Trigger:** Cease and desist or inquiry received

**Owner:** Legal
**Review Date:** Monthly

Title: Live Event Technical Failure
Description:
Stream, auction, or registration system fails during event.

**Likelihood:** Medium
**Impact:** High

**Mitigations:**
- Full dry runs completed
- Backup streaming platform
- Manual auction fallback
- Communication templates ready

**Trigger:** System unresponsive during live window

**Owner:** Event Ops
**Review Date:** Pre-event

Title: Key Issuance Failure
Description:
Unable to mint or deliver access keys.

**Likelihood:** Low
**Impact:** High

**Mitigations:**
- 5x retry with backoff
- Manual issuance fallback
- Payment hold until resolved
- Customer communication templates

**Trigger:** Key mint fails after all retries

**Owner:** Engineering
**Review Date:** Post-event

Title: Churn Spike
Description:
Unexpected increase in subscription cancellations.

**Likelihood:** Medium
**Impact:** High

**Mitigations:**
- Churn reason tracking
- Win-back campaigns ready
- Downgrade offers automated
- Immediate analysis protocol

**Trigger:** Churn rate >2x baseline for any week

**Owner:** Customer Success
**Review Date:** Weekly

Title: Data Breach
Description:
Unauthorized access to member or business data.

**Likelihood:** Low
**Impact:** Critical

**Mitigations:**
- Encryption at rest and in transit
- Access logging
- Incident response plan
- Insurance coverage
- Breach notification templates

**Trigger:** Anomalous access pattern or alert

**Owner:** Security
**Review Date:** Weekly

Title: Deepfake/Impersonation Attack
Description:
Synthetic media used to impersonate founders or host.

**Likelihood:** Low
**Impact:** High

**Mitigations:**
- Media monitoring active
- Verification protocols with partners
- Rapid takedown procedures
- Public statement templates

**Trigger:** Report or monitoring alert

**Owner:** Security
**Review Date:** Monthly
